source.5257ab2e:
dfs18_19 = df_quantity[df_quantity.Year=='2018-2019']
dfs19_20 = df_quantity[df_quantity.Year=='2019-2020']
dfs20_21 = df_quantity[df_quantity.Year=='2020-2021']

sns.set_theme(style="whitegrid")

plt.figure(figsize=(14, 14))

bar1 = sns.barplot(x="Quantity(MetricTonne)", y="Country", data=dfs18_19, color='#59284E')
bar2 = sns.barplot(x="Quantity(MetricTonne)", y="Country", data=dfs19_20, color='#B53158')
bar3 = sns.barplot(x="Quantity(MetricTonne)", y="Country", data=dfs20_21, color='#E19172')

bar_3rd = mpatches.Patch(color='#59284E', label='2020-2021')
bar_2nd = mpatches.Patch(color='#B53158', label='2019-2020')
bar_1st = mpatches.Patch(color='#E19172', label='2018-2019')

plt.legend(handles=[bar_1st, bar_2nd, bar_3rd])

plt.show()

source.1f613991:
### Data Task
Find out the country which has highest values of quantity, value and unitValues and plot it on a bar plot
source.856c8de3:
### Results

Among 50 countries where India exported coffee from 2018 to 2021:

#### Quantity (Ton)
Italy has a significantly large amount of coffee exported from the country compared to other countries. 6 out of top 10 countries are located in Europe. Top 10 countries with the most quantities are Italy (Top 1), Germany, Belgium, Russian Federation, Libya, Poland, Jordan, Malaysia, U.S.A, Slovenia.

#### Value (Lakhs)
Coffee value ranking by country is mostly aligned with quantity. Top 10 countries with the most costs of the coffee are Italy (Top 1), Germany, Russian Federation, Belgium, Poland, Turkey, Jordan, Libya, Kuwait, Indonesia

#### Unit Value (Rupees/Ton)
Nepal has the highest unit value among the export countries. Top 10 countries with the most unit value are Nepal (Top 1), Morocco, Saudi Arabia, Japan, Jordan, UAE, Kuwait, Togo, United Kingdom, Mauritania
